summary: This bill, the Accelerating the Growth of Rural Innovation and Tourism Opportunities to Uphold Rural Industries and Sustainable Marketplaces Act (AGRITOURISM Act), mandates the establishment of an Office of Agritourism within the Department of Agriculture. This office will promote agritourism activities, including educational experiences, outdoor recreation, and direct sales, in each state. The Director will coordinate with other agencies, advise the Secretary, and provide assistance to agritourism businesses.
